name: lava-plume
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.
